job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.
   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

   Your team
   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer

We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.
   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

   Your team
   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on developing user-facing applications leveraging generative AI and conversational agents, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While it involves software development and iterative prototyping, the primary driver is the application of generative AI in a product context.

job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare providers in their logistical processes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business domain (healthcare logistics) and the goal of the product.

job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare workers with logistical challenges
job_tasks.justification: This further elaborates on the business context and the problem the product aims to solve.
Directly mentions the use of generative AI, which is a core component of modeling in this context.

job_tasks.phrase: leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the application and exploration of generative AI and conversational agents, falling under modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on building a product around the AI technology, requiring software development skills.
Indicates the need for rapid software development to create testable versions of the product.
Explicitly mentions core software development skills required for building applications.
Describes an iterative software development process for refining the product.

job_tasks.phrase: building a new product from scratch
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes the software development aspect of creating a new product.

job_tasks.phrase: iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, the iterative and exploratory nature of deploying and refining new technologies in a product context touches upon operational aspects.

soft_skills.skill: work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members
accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery
likes to go the extra mile
willingness to learn and implement new technologies
